A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too much slapstick comedy\, too many plot holes\, too many throw away moments all for the sake of misdirection\, and somehow Rey and BB8 are the most powerful things in the galaxy without any explanation or realism.\n\nSomething went very wrong here. I don't know how a lot of this stuff got passed the drawing board. They did some thing well\, but overall it was too ridiculous to be a good movie.
